original_text: And all Israel in the days of Zerubbabel and in the days of Nehemiah gave the daily portions for the singers and the gatekeepers; and they set apart that which was for the Levites; and the Levites set apart that which was for the sons of Aaron.
korean_text: 스룹바벨 때와 느헤미야 때에는 온 이스라엘이 노래하는 자들과 문지기들에게 날마다 쓸 몫을 주되 그들이 성별한 것을 레위 사람들에게 주고 레위 사람들은 그것을 또 성별하여 아론 자손에게 주었느니라

sentences.original_text: And all Israel in the days of Zerubbabel
and in the days of Nehemiah
gave the daily portions for the singers
and they set apart that which was for the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 레위 사람들을 위한 것을 구별하였고

sentences.original_text: and the Levites set apart that which was for the sons of Aaron
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들은 아론의 자손들을 위한 것을 구별하였더라
